newsitem.title: USA: Telco Comms calls AT&T suit meritless.
newsitem.headline: Telco Comms calls AT&T suit meritless.

text.p: Telco Communications Group Inc said on Wednesday the lawsuit filed against it by AT&T Corp was without merit.
The company said it plans to defend itself vigorously against the allegations.
AT&T said it filed a lawsuit against Telco and VarTec Telecom Inc, charging them with false and misleading advertising about their savings plans.

"We stand behind all the savings claims we make to our customers. We believe the complaint is simply an attempt by AT&T to limit competition and to prevent customers from receiving the benefits of lower long distance rates," said Donald Burns, Telco's president and chief executive.
